remarks: Lemma for ~ resthaus and similar theorems.  If the topological property ` A ` is preserved under injective preimages, then property ` A ` passes to subspaces.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 25-Aug-2015.)
statement:
resthauslem.1 $e |- ( J e. A -> J e. Top ) $.
resthauslem.2 $e |- ( ( J e. A /\ ( _I |` ( S i^i U. J ) ) : ( S i^i U. J ) -1-1-> ( S i^i U. J ) /\ ( _I |` ( S i^i U. J ) ) e. ( ( J |`t S ) Cn J ) ) -> ( J |`t S ) e. A ) $.
resthauslem $p |- ( ( J e. A /\ S e. V ) -> ( J |`t S ) e. A ) $.
